embed.title: Arena Point
embed.description:
• Each player starts each Arena season with 2500, 2000, or 1000 Rank Points (<:aowcup:849196168495628309>), depending on the player’s performance in the previous season.
• After a player does a battle (either on offense and defense), the player’s Rank Point updated.
• The game uses the winner’s Rank Point and the loser’s Rank Point to calculate the point.
